name: Remote 4
details:
Remote footswitch for Tensor pedalTensor remote switch with 4 modes to access presets and pedal functions.  Scribble strips above each switch can be labeled with a Sharpie and erased using isopropyl alcohol.
Connects to the Tensor or Particle 2 via a 1/4" TRS cable (included).  The Tensor firmware needs to be version 1.1 or later (available here).  The Remote 4 does not require power.
Size: 10" x 2.75" x 2.25" high
http://www.redpandalab.com/products/remote-4.html
